sub_title: Legal Counsel at the Permanent Court of Arbitration
summary:
Legal Counsel and Representative of the Permanent Court of Arbitration in Mauritius ||| Associate researcher at the Laboratoire DANTE (University of Paris Saclay) ||| Founding member of AfricArb

||| Lawyer (Paris Bar) in International Arbitration (omitted from the bar as of 12 August 2019) |||
